text: West Burlington is a hamlet in the western part of the Town of Burlington in Otsego County, New York. It is located at , three miles east of the town of Edmeston on NY 51 and NY 80\. The West Burlington Memorial Church was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 2001. ==Notable people== *Frances Augusta Hemingway Conant ==References== Category:Hamlets in New York (state) Category:Hamlets in Otsego County, New York
title: West Burlington, New York
